name: uom
description: Extensible unit of measure conversion with type safety for typescript
author: jonas.kello@divid.se

scripts.build: yarn build:clean && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:esm && yarn gen-docs
scripts.verify: yarn lint && yarn build && yarn test-coverage
scripts.gen-docs: jsdoc2md --partial docs/scope.hbs --files lib-esm/serialize.js lib-esm/format.js lib-esm/amount.js lib-esm/unit.js > docs/api.md
scripts.publish-npm: git checkout master && git pull && yarn test && yarn build && yarn publish && git push --follow-tags
